Summon Commander:#811 Succubus
The caster sacrifices several blood slaves to contact and bind a Succubus, or demon lover. Succubi have the appearance of beautiful naked women with leathery bat-wings. They are able to enter the dreams of men to seduce and corrupt their souls. A Succubus that successfully seduces an enemy commander will take him from his bed and fly him home to her master where he will serve until he dies.
